rationale: The agent's diff is functionally identical to the ground truth diff. Both remove the USE_LUCENE101_POSTINGS_FORMAT feature flag from exactly the same 5 files: SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java, ClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java, FeatureFlag.java (enum definition), LogsdbTestSuiteIT.java, and CoreWithSecurityClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java. The changes are line-for-line identical - removing the .feature(FeatureFlag.USE_LUCENE101_POSTINGS_FORMAT) calls from test configurations and removing the USE_LUCENE101_POSTINGS_FORMAT enum entry. The only differences in the diff output are the abbreviated commit hashes (e.g., '2be870db' vs '2be870dbf4e'), which are inconsequential formatting variations in git diff output, not actual code differences. The agent correctly identified all instances of the feature flag and removed them completely, achieving the exact same result as the ground truth.
ground_truth_patch:
diff --git a/qa/smoke-test-multinode/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/smoketest/SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java b/qa/smoke-test-multinode/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/smoketest/SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java
index 2be870dbf4e..df25624263a 100644
--- a/qa/smoke-test-multinode/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/smoketest/SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java
+++ b/qa/smoke-test-multinode/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/smoketest/SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java
@@ -37,7 +37,6 @@ public class SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT extends ESClientYamlSuiteTe
         .feature(FeatureFlag.TIME_SERIES_MODE)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.SUB_OBJECTS_AUTO_ENABLED)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.DOC_VALUES_SKIPPER)
-        .feature(FeatureFlag.USE_LUCENE101_POSTINGS_FORMAT)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.IVF_FORMAT)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.SYNTHETIC_VECTORS)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.RERANK_SNIPPETS)
